timeline.message:
Lock dev dependencies via new module with generated versions file
(#8197)

* Lock all transitive dependency versions

* Generate all dev dependencies versions into the file based on test
project
* Put this file into a new artifact
* Read the file from the classpath and produce versions.json based on it
* pnpmfile.js will use the versions.json to choose the version

Fixes #7958
# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/test/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/frontend/TaskRunPnpmInstallTest.java
#	flow-test-generic/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/testutil/ClassesSerializableTest.java

Add methods to control validation (#8094)

- Enable / disable all validators on Binder level
- Enable / disable validators on Binding level
- add writeBeanAsDraft(bean,boolean) for writing draft bean with validators disabled

Fixes #5030
